protocol.name: P-G3423-1
protocol.text: Approximately 10 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.

protocol.name: P-G3423-2
protocol.text: 4 x 3 rosettes were harvested and directly frozen by liquid nitrogen, inside the growth chamber. The material of 15 rosettes was ground in liquid nitrogen.Total RNA was extracted from 250 mg fresh weight using 5 ml TriZol. Organic compounts were removed by 2 chloroform extractions. Precipitation was done with sodium chloride/sodium citrate/2-propanol over night at 4Â°C. Ethanol wash of RNA pellet was done twice with 75% Ethanol. Total RNA was dissolved in pure H2O.
